commands.name: az networkfabric internetgatewayrule create
commands.summary: Create an Internet Gateway Rule resource.
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric internetgatewayrule create --resource-group
                                            --resource-name
                                            --rule-properties
                                            [--annotation]
                                            [--location]
                                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--tags]

commands.name: az networkfabric internetgatewayrule delete
commands.summary: Delete the Internet Gateway Rule resource.
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric internetgatewayrule delete [--ids]
                                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--resource-group]
                                            [--resource-name]
                                            [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkfabric internetgatewayrule list
commands.summary: List all Internet Gateway Rules in the provided resource group or subscription.

commands.name: az networkfabric internetgatewayrule show
commands.summary: Show details of the provided Internet Gateway Rule resource.

commands.name: az networkfabric internetgatewayrule update
commands.summary: Update the Internet Gateway Rule resource.
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric internetgatewayrule update [--ids]
                                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--resource-group]
                                            [--resource-name]
                                            [--subscription]
                                            [--tags]

commands.name: az networkfabric internetgatewayrule wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
